AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States v. Garcia: case involving the use of the Allen charge in trials and the smuggling of undocumented aliens, with jury instructions emphasizing the importance of reaching a verdict after approximately 2 hours of deliberation, and the jury returning its guilty verdict at about 4:45 p.m.
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Maria De Jesus Garcia: defendant in a trial related to illegal alien smuggling, appealing the use of the Allen charge, with her pickup truck camper being stopped by United States Border Patrol agents
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States District Court: court that refused to conduct a post-verdict hearing on whether the jury was coerced by the Allen charge and instructed the jury to continue deliberation
